item.title: Courses Resources
item.author: Morris
item.description: Course Map CSDIY Courses Wireless IoT Introduction, Prof.Jiliang Wang: IoT techenique introduction that explains wireless communication and sensing. (In Chinese) Embeded Systems Bootlin-Embeded Linux CTF MetaCTF_Blog: Basic concepts introduction of CTF, hosted by UVA undergraduate students. Tools Tutorials Vim Interactive Vim tutorial: A guide to basic vim commands. Vim9.0 Quick Setup Tutorial: A qucik setup tutorial of VIM 9.0 Setup, including how to install plugins.

item.title: Misc Resources
item.author: Morris
item.description: About Here are some useful resources. In SCU SCU网络避坑指北 SCU计金作业汇总 Interesting Tools Code Visualizer: A very useful tool to visualize the code execution process, like the stack and the heap. It is used in UCB CS61A and 61B. Interesting Websites Trolley Problems: A interactive website with trolley problems.

item.title: Music Resources
item.author: Morris
item.description: Music Resources electroSmash: Circuit introduction of famous guitar effects unit. JazzStandards : Well-known Jazz standards lists. MusicMap : The Genealogy and History of Popular Music Genres. Encyclopaedia Metallum: The famous metal archives.

item.title: Reading Resources
item.author: Morris
item.description: Undergradute Methodology 交大生存手册 Methodology How to read Paper: There is a well-known essay that recommends a three-step process for reading a paper. How to Look for Ideas in Computer Science Research: Written by Prof. Zhiyun Qian. The idea of finding vulnerabilities is impressive. GoodReading: A senior SCUer recommended reading resources. Dingzeyu Li Podcast: This is a podcast channel. The topics are mainly about the personal
